footer.join_team: JOIN THE TEAM OF CUSTOMER WHO USE NEO BAZAAR TO SHARE THEIR KNOWLEDGE. EASILY CREATE AND SELL DIGITAL DOWNLOADS USING OUR POWERFUL YET SIMPLE PLATFORM.

category.category_description_1: Looking for inspiration on what you can sell?
category.category_description_2: Discover the best-selling products and creators

sell_to_anyone.name: Sell to anyone
sell_to_anyone.1: BUILD A LOYAL FOLLOWING WITH SIMPLE POSTS, EMAIL NEWSLETTERS, AND AUTOMATED WORKFLOWS. PLUS LET YOUR CUSTOMERS PAY WHAT THEY WANT OR CHOOSE BETWEEN ONE-TIME, RECURRING, OR FIXED-LENGTH PAYMENTS IN YOUR CURRENCY OF CHOICE.

sell_anywhere.name: Sell anywhere
sell_anywhere.1: CREATE AND CUSTOMIZE YOUR STOREFRONT WITH OUR ALL-IN-ONE PLATFORM OR CHOOSE TO USE YOUR PERSONAL SITE INSTEAD. WITH ZAPIER, YOU CAN SEAMLESSLY CONNECT YOUR NEOBAZAAR ACCOUNT TO THOUSANDS OF APPS IN YOUR CURRENT STACK.

description.name: DIGITAL PLATFORM
description.description: THIS IS A SPACE FOR INTERACTION BETWEEN CREATORS AND USERS, PROMOTES THE DISTRIBUTION OF DIGITAL CONTENT AND PROVIDES OPPORTUNITIES FOR MONETIZATION AND DEVELOPMENT IN THE DIGITAL ENVIRONMENT.

form.password_requirements: From 8 to 30 characters. Latin letters, numbers and symbols: !, ?, -, _, . Min 1 digit, 1 letter in lowercase and 1 letter in uppercase

errors.email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address (letters, numbers, ., -, _ only).
errors.password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
errors.password_contains_digit: Password must contain at least one digit.
errors.password_contains_lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
errors.password_contains_uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
errors.password_contains_special_char: Password must contain at least one special character (!?, -, _,.).

login.email_pattern: Please enter a valid email address (letters, numbers, ., -, _ only).

general_provisions.title: 1. General provisions
general_provisions.text_1: This privacy policy and personal data processing is compiled in accordance with the requirements of the Law "On Personal Data Protection" (further referred to as the Personal Data Law) and defines the procedure for processing personal data and measures to ensure the security of personal data taken by NeoBazaar (further referred to as the Operator).
general_provisions.text_2: 1.1. The Operator sets as its most important goal and condition for the implementation of its activities the observance of human and civil rights and freedoms in the processing of his personal data, including the protection of the rights to privacy, personal and family secrets.
general_provisions.text_3: 1.2. This Operator's policy regarding the processing of personal data (hereinafter referred to as the Policy) applies to all information that the Operator can receive about visitors to the website
general_provisions.text_4: 1.3. The User's use of the site means acceptance of this Privacy Policy and the terms of processing of the User's personal data.
general_provisions.text_5: 1.4. In case of disagreement with the terms of the Privacy Policy, the User must stop using the Website.

basic_concepts.title: 2. Basic concepts used in Politics
basic_concepts.text_1: 2.1. Automated processing of personal data – processing of personal data using computer technology.
basic_concepts.text_2: 2.2. Blocking of personal data – temporary termination of the processing of personal data (except in cases where processing is necessary to clarify personal data).
basic_concepts.text_3: 2.3. Website, Website - a set of graphic and information materials, as well as computer programs and databases that ensure their availability on the Internet at a network address
basic_concepts.text_4: 2.4. Personal data information system – a set of personal data contained in databases and information technologies and technical means that ensure their processing.
basic_concepts.text_5: 2.5. Depersonalization of personal data – actions as a result of which it is impossible to determine, without using additional information, the identity of personal data to a specific User or other personal data subject.
basic_concepts.text_6: 2.6. Processing of personal data – any action (operation) or a set of actions (operations) performed with or without the use of automation tools with personal data, including collection, recording, systematization, accumulation, storage, clarification (updating, modification), extraction, use, transfer (distribution, provision, access), depersonalization, blocking, deletion, destruction of personal data.
basic_concepts.text_8: 2.8. Personal data – any information related directly or indirectly to a specific or identifiable User of the website
basic_concepts.text_9: 2.9. Personal data authorized by the subject of personal data for dissemination – personal data to which an unlimited number of persons have access by the subject of personal data by giving consent to the processing of personal data authorized by the subject of personal data for distribution in accordance with the procedure provided for by the Law on Personal Data (hereinafter referred to as personal data authorized for distribution).
basic_concepts.text_10: 2.10. User – any visitor to the website
basic_concepts.text_11: 2.11. Provision of personal data – actions aimed at disclosing personal data to a certain person or a certain circle of persons.
basic_concepts.text_12: 2.12. Dissemination of personal data – any actions aimed at disclosure of personal data to an indefinite circle of persons (transfer of personal data) or familiarization with personal data of an unlimited number of persons, including disclosure of personal data in the media, posting in information and telecommunications networks or providing access to personal data in any other way.
basic_concepts.text_13: 2.13. Cross–border transfer of personal data is the transfer of personal data to the territory of a foreign state to an authority of a foreign state, a foreign individual or a foreign legal entity.
basic_concepts.text_14: 2.14. Destruction of personal data – any actions as a result of which personal data is permanently destroyed with the inability to further restore the content of personal data in the personal data information system and/or the material carriers of personal data are destroyed.
basic_concepts.text_15: 2.15. "Cookies" is a small piece of data sent by a web server and stored on the user's computer, which the web client or web browser sends to the web server in an HTTP request each time when trying to open a page of the corresponding site.
basic_concepts.text_16: 2.16. "IP address" is a unique network address of a node in a computer network built using the IP protocol.

operator_rights_and_obligations.title: 3. Basic rights and obligations of the Operator
operator_rights_and_obligations.text_1: 3.1. The Operator has the right to:
operator_rights_and_obligations.text_2: – receive reliable information and/or documents containing personal data from the subject of personal data;
operator_rights_and_obligations.text_3: – in case of withdrawal by the subject of personal data of consent to the processing of personal data, as well as sending a request to terminate the processing of personal data, the Operator has the right to continue processing personal data without the consent of the subject of personal data if there are grounds specified in the Law on Personal Data;
operator_rights_and_obligations.text_4: – independently determine the composition and list of measures necessary and sufficient to ensure the fulfillment of obligations provided for by the Law on Personal Data and regulatory legal acts adopted in accordance with it, unless otherwise provided by the Law on Personal Data or other laws.
operator_rights_and_obligations.text_6: – to provide the subject of personal data, at his request, with information concerning the processing of his personal data;
operator_rights_and_obligations.text_7: – organize the processing of personal data in accordance with the procedure established by the current legislation;
operator_rights_and_obligations.text_8: – respond to requests and requests from personal data subjects and their legal representatives in accordance with the requirements of the Law on Personal Data;
operator_rights_and_obligations.text_9: – to inform the authorized body for the protection of the rights of personal data subjects at the request of this body of the necessary information within 10 days from the date of receipt of such a request;
operator_rights_and_obligations.text_10: – to publish or otherwise provide unrestricted access to this Policy regarding the processing of personal data;
operator_rights_and_obligations.text_11: – take legal, organizational and technical measures to protect personal data from unauthorized or accidental access to them, destruction, modification, blocking, copying, provision, dissemination of personal data, as well as from other illegal actions in relation to personal data;
operator_rights_and_obligations.text_12: – stop transferring (distributing, providing, accessing) personal data, stop processing and destroy personal data in the manner and in the cases provided for by the Law on Personal Data;
operator_rights_and_obligations.text_13: – perform other duties provided for by the Law on Personal Data.
operator_rights_and_obligations.text_14: 3.3. The Operator does not verify the accuracy of the personal data provided by the User of the site.

data_subject_rights_and_obligations.title: 4. Basic rights and obligations of personal data subjects
data_subject_rights_and_obligations.text_1: 4.1. Personal data subjects have the right to:
data_subject_rights_and_obligations.text_2: – receive information regarding the processing of his personal data, except in cases provided for by law. The information is provided to the personal data subject by the Operator in an accessible form, and it should not contain personal data related to other personal data subjects, except in cases where there are legitimate grounds for disclosure of such personal data. The list of information and the procedure for obtaining it is established by the Law on Personal Data;
data_subject_rights_and_obligations.text_3: – to require the operator to clarify his personal data, block or destroy them if the personal data is incomplete, outdated, inaccurate, illegally obtained or is not necessary for the stated purpose of processing, as well as to take measures provided for by law to protect their rights;
data_subject_rights_and_obligations.text_4: – to put forward a condition of prior consent when processing personal data in order to promote goods, works and services on the market;
data_subject_rights_and_obligations.text_5: – to revoke consent to the processing of personal data, as well as to send a request to terminate the processing of personal data;
data_subject_rights_and_obligations.text_6: – to appeal to the authorized body for the protection of the rights of personal data subjects or in court against illegal actions or inaction of the Operator during the processing of his personal data;
data_subject_rights_and_obligations.text_7: – to exercise other rights provided for by the legislation.
data_subject_rights_and_obligations.text_8: 4.2. The subjects of personal data are obliged to:
data_subject_rights_and_obligations.text_9: – provide the Operator with reliable data about themselves;
data_subject_rights_and_obligations.text_10: – inform the Operator about the clarification (updating, modification) of their personal data.
data_subject_rights_and_obligations.text_11: 4.3. Persons who have provided the Operator with false information about themselves or information about another personal data subject without the latter's consent are liable in accordance with the legislation.

list_of_personal_data.title: 5. The list of personal data for the processing of which the consent of the personal data subject is given
list_of_personal_data.text_1: 5.1. This Privacy Policy establishes the obligations of the Operator to non-disclosure and ensure the protection of the confidentiality of personal data that the User provides at the request of the Operator.
list_of_personal_data.text_2: 5.2. The personal data authorized for processing under this Privacy Policy is provided by the User by filling out registration forms on the Website
list_of_personal_data.text_3: 5.3. Registration data includes the following information:
list_of_personal_data.text_6: 5.4. The operator carries out the collection and processing of anonymous data that is automatically transferred to browse the site, ad units and when visiting pages that have the statistical script of the system ("pixel"), including through the services of Internet statistics (Yandex Metric and Google Analytics):
list_of_personal_data.text_9: – information about the browser (or other program that provides access to the display of ads);
list_of_personal_data.text_11: – the address of the page where the ad block is located;
list_of_personal_data.text_12: – the address of the requested page;
list_of_personal_data.text_14: 5.5. Disabling cookies may result in the inability to access parts of the site that require authorization.

principles_of_processing.title: 6. Principles of personal data processing
principles_of_processing.text_1: 6.1. The processing of personal data is carried out on a lawful and fair basis.
principles_of_processing.text_2: 6.2. The processing of personal data is limited to achieving specific, predetermined and legitimate goals. Processing of personal data incompatible with the purposes of personal data collection is not allowed.
principles_of_processing.text_3: 6.3. It is not allowed to combine databases containing personal data, the processing of which is carried out for purposes incompatible with each other.
principles_of_processing.text_4: 6.4. Only personal data that meet the purposes of their processing are subject to processing.
principles_of_processing.text_5: 6.5. The content and volume of the processed personal data correspond to the stated purposes of processing. Redundancy of the processed personal data in relation to the stated purposes of their processing is not allowed.
principles_of_processing.text_6: 6.6. When processing personal data, the accuracy of personal data, their sufficiency, and, if necessary, relevance in relation to the purposes of personal data processing are ensured. The Operator takes the necessary measures and/or ensures that they are taken to delete or clarify incomplete or inaccurate data.
principles_of_processing.text_7: 6.7. Personal data is stored in a form that allows you to identify the subject of personal data, no longer than the purposes of personal data processing require, unless the period of personal data storage is established by law, an agreement to which the subject of personal data is a party, beneficiary or guarantor. The processed personal data is destroyed or depersonalized upon achievement of the processing goals or in case of loss of the need to achieve these goals, unless otherwise provided by law.

purposes_of_processing.title: 7. Purposes of Processing Personal Data
purposes_of_processing.text_1: 7.1. The Operator processes the User's personal data for the following purposes:
purposes_of_processing.text_3: – providing personal data subjects with Website products;
purposes_of_processing.text_4: – identification of the personal data subject;
purposes_of_processing.text_5: – providing the subject of personal data with access to the Website;
purposes_of_processing.text_6: – establishing feedback with the subject of personal data, including sending notifications, requests, processing requests and requests from the subject of personal data;
purposes_of_processing.text_7: – providing the subject of personal data with effective customer and technical support in case of problems related to the use of the Website;
purposes_of_processing.text_8: – providing the subject of personal data with news and (or) advertising newsletters, as well as other information by electronic communication E-mail and other means of communication;
purposes_of_processing.text_9: – depersonalized User data collected using Internet statistics services are used to collect information about User actions on the Site, improve the quality of the Site and its content;
purposes_of_processing.text_10: – create an account for making online payments;
purposes_of_processing.text_12: – formation of statistical reports, conducting research;
purposes_of_processing.text_14: – exercise of other powers and duties assigned to the Operator by the legislation.

legal_bases_of_processing.title: 8. Terms of personal data processing
legal_bases_of_processing.text_1: 8.1. The processing of personal data is carried out with the consent of the personal data subject to the processing of his personal data.
legal_bases_of_processing.text_2: 8.2. The processing of personal data is necessary to achieve the goals provided for by law, to carry out the functions, powers and duties assigned to the operator by the legislation.
legal_bases_of_processing.text_3: 8.3. The processing of personal data is necessary for the administration of justice, the execution of a judicial act, an act of another body or official to be executed in accordance with the legislation on enforcement proceedings.
legal_bases_of_processing.text_4: 8.4. The processing of personal data is necessary for the performance of an agreement to which the personal data subject is a party or beneficiary or guarantor, as well as for the conclusion of an agreement on the initiative of the personal data subject or an agreement under which the personal data subject will be the beneficiary or guarantor.
legal_bases_of_processing.text_5: 8.5. The processing of personal data is necessary to exercise the rights and legitimate interests of the operator or third parties or to achieve socially significant goals, provided that the rights and freedoms of the personal data subject are not violated.
legal_bases_of_processing.text_6: 8.6. Personal data is processed, access to which is provided to an unlimited number of persons by the subject of personal data or at his request (hereinafter referred to as publicly available personal data).
legal_bases_of_processing.text_7: 8.7. Personal data subject to publication or mandatory disclosure in accordance with the law is processed.

procedures_and_conditions.title: 9. The procedure for the collection, storage, transfer and other types of personal data processing
procedures_and_conditions.text_1: 9.1. The security of personal data processed by the Operator is ensured through the implementation of legal, organizational and technical measures necessary to fully comply with the requirements of current legislation in the field of personal data protection.
procedures_and_conditions.text_2: 9.2. The Operator ensures the safety of personal data and takes all possible measures to exclude access to personal data of unauthorized persons.
procedures_and_conditions.text_3: 9.3. The User's personal data will never, under any circumstances, be transferred to third parties, except in cases related to the implementation of current legislation or if the subject of personal data has given consent to the Operator to transfer data to a third party to fulfill obligations under a civil contract.
procedures_and_conditions.text_4: 9.4. The period of processing of personal data is determined by the achievement of the purposes for which personal data was collected, unless another period is provided for by the contract or current legislation.
procedures_and_conditions.text_5: 9.5. The User may revoke his consent to the processing of personal data at any time by sending a notification to the Operator by e-mail to the Operator's e-mail address neodigitalbazaar@gmail.com marked "Withdrawal of consent to the processing of personal data".
procedures_and_conditions.text_6: 9.6. All information collected by third-party services, including payment systems, means of communication and other service providers, is stored and processed by these persons (Operators) in accordance with their User Agreement and Privacy Policy. The subject of personal data and/or with the specified documents. The Operator is not responsible for the actions of third parties, including the service providers specified in this paragraph.
procedures_and_conditions.text_7: 9.7. The prohibitions established by the subject of personal data on the transfer (except for granting access), as well as on the processing or conditions of processing (except for obtaining access) of personal data allowed for distribution, do not apply in cases of processing personal data in the state, public and other public interests defined by the legislation.
procedures_and_conditions.text_8: 9.8. The Operator ensures the confidentiality of personal data when processing personal data.
procedures_and_conditions.text_9: 9.9. The Operator stores personal data in a form that allows determining the subject of personal data for no longer than the purposes of personal data processing require, unless the period of personal data storage is established by law, an agreement to which the subject of personal data is a party, beneficiary or guarantor.
procedures_and_conditions.text_10: 9.10. The condition for the termination of personal data processing may be the achievement of the purposes of personal data processing, the expiration of the consent of the personal data subject, the withdrawal of consent by the personal data subject or the requirement to terminate the processing of personal data, as well as the identification of unlawful processing of personal data.

updating_rectification_and_deletion.title: 10. List of actions performed by the Operator with the received personal data
updating_rectification_and_deletion.text_1: 10.1. The Operator collects, records, systematizes, accumulates, stores, clarifies (updates, changes), extracts, uses, transfers (distributes, provides, accesses), depersonalizes, blocks, deletes and destroys personal data.
updating_rectification_and_deletion.text_2: 10.2. The Operator performs automated processing of personal data with or without receiving and/or transmitting the received information by information and telecommunication networks.

cross_border_transfer.title: 11. Cross-border transfer of personal data
cross_border_transfer.text_1: 11.1. Prior to the start of cross-border transfer of personal data, the Operator is obliged to notify the authorized body for the protection of the rights of personal data subjects of its intention to carry out cross-border transfer of personal data (such notification is sent separately from the notification of the intention to process personal data).
cross_border_transfer.text_2: 11.2. Before submitting the above notification, the Operator is obliged to receive relevant information from the authorities of a foreign state, foreign individuals, and foreign legal entities to whom the cross-border transfer of personal data is planned.

privacy_policy_terms.title: 12. Confidentiality of personal data
privacy_policy_terms.text_1: The operator and other persons who have gained access to personal data are obliged not to disclose or distribute personal data to third parties without the consent of the personal data subject, unless otherwise provided for by the legislation.

concluding_provisions.title: 13. Final provisions
concluding_provisions.text_1: 13.1. Issues related to the processing of personal data that are not fixed in this Policy are regulated by the legislation.
concluding_provisions.text_2: 13.2. If any provision of the Policy is found to be contrary to the law, the remaining provisions that comply with the law remain in force and are valid, and any invalid provision will be considered deleted/amended to the extent necessary to ensure its compliance with the law.
concluding_provisions.text_3: 13.3. The User can receive any clarifications on issues of interest related to the processing of his personal data by contacting the Operator by e-mail
concluding_provisions.text_4: 13.4. This document will reflect any changes to the Operator's personal data processing policy. The policy is valid indefinitely until it is replaced by a new version.
concluding_provisions.text_5: 13.5. The current version of the Policy is available on the website

terms_of_use.title: Terms of use
terms_of_use.introduction: These Terms of Use (further referred to as the "Agreement") are accepted by NeoBazaar (further referred to as the "Company") and apply to website
terms_of_use.platform_description: branded pages on other platforms, mobile and other applications used to work with such websites and other platforms (further referred to as the "Platform"), which are operated directly by the Company or on her behalf. By continuing to register or using the Platform, you automatically accept this Agreement. In case of any problems and complaints, you agree and undertake to try to resolve them first in a pre-trial manner by contacting
terms_of_use.content_description: You are responsible for your own "Content" that you create, including any information, materials or any other content that you post on the Platform. Your Content must comply with this Agreement, ethical standards and laws. As responsible for Your Content, you agree, among other things, that:
terms_of_use.content_point1: - You have all the necessary permissions, rights and licenses necessary to work with these Content, post them on the Platform or transfer them to the Company;
terms_of_use.content_point2: - Your Content does not include personal, private or confidential information belonging to others;
terms_of_use.content_point3: - Your Content does not violate the rights of any individual or legal entity;
terms_of_use.content_point4: - It is forbidden to create Content on the Platform in order to gain access to the personal data of visitors to the Platform, aimed at offering civil law contracts with users of the Platform, as well as involving interaction with users of the Platform, the final purpose of which is to attract users of the Platform as employees and/or contractors to any organization, the conclusion of an employment or a civil contract with the users of the Platform.
terms_of_use.content_clause: We do not require the transfer of ownership of your Content to us. However, in order to ensure the functioning of the Platform, its improvements, promotion, advertising, as well as to protect the Company and the Platform, you grant the Company a non-exclusive, worldwide, perpetual, irrevocable, free, sublicensable, transferable right and license (including the waiver of any moral rights) to use, post, store, reproduce, modify, publish, public demonstration, distribution and creation of derivative Content, as well as the use (including commercial) of copyrights, trademarks, advertising rights and databases, which you have in relation to your Content. This license will allow your Content to remain on the Platform even after you cease to be a member of the Company or the Platform.
terms_of_use.content_responsibility: We are not responsible for the Content posted by users of the Platform. We do not pre-moderate all the Content. If you find Content that violates this Agreement, please let us know at
terms_of_use.personal_data_description_1: The Company collects registration and other information about you collected through the Platform. Please read the following documents in order to learn more about what data we collect and why:
terms_of_use.personal_data_description_2: . By continuing to register or use the Platform, you agree to all of the above rules. Please note that these rules and documents do not cover the use of information by users of the Platform.
terms_of_use.using_platform_description: You agree that you will not, directly or indirectly, extract data from the Platform for commercial purposes without the permission of this Agreement by automatic methods, either with the help of third parties, or by other methods; (b) perform any actions that harm, damage or overload the Platform with data or requests.
terms_of_use.using_platform_clause_1: You agree to use, store and process personal data collected through the Platform in accordance with the law, ethical and moral principles. You undertake to inform the users of the Platform whose data you process or own about your actions with this data and undertake to process requests from these users related to their data. You also undertake to securely store and protect data from unauthorized access, processing, and delete them as soon as the need for which this data was collected disappears, or at the request of representatives of the Platform.
terms_of_use.using_platform_clause_2: Using the Platform involves interacting with real people and performing real actions in the real world, which can lead to unforeseen situations. We cannot control what happens outside the Platform and we are not responsible for it. You should use common sense when interacting with other users of the Platform. Also, the Platform does not control user behavior, so the Platform is not responsible for their actions. If you find behavior that violates this Agreement, ethical standards or the law, please contact us by email
terms_of_use.dispute_resolution_description_1: Before submitting a claim, you and the Company agree to try to resolve any disputes through dialogue. We use the term "claim" in this paragraph to refer to any disputes, claims or disagreements arising from or related to your use of our Platform or this Agreement. You or the Company can initiate this process by sending a written notification describing the problem and the proposed solution. The main contact for these purposes on the Company's side is the email address
terms_of_use.dispute_resolution_description_2: If we are unable to resolve the problem within 30 business days after receiving the message and confirmation of its receipt, you or the Company can go to court.
terms_of_use.intellectual_property_description: The Company's trademarks, logos, registered names and titles are the intellectual property of the Company. Our Platform, including the materials on the Platform, are also our intellectual property or the property of our licensors. You agree not to use our intellectual property without our written permission.
terms_of_use.intellectual_property_clause_1: The company respects the intellectual property of others and we expect the same behavior from our users. Under certain circumstances and at our discretion, we may remove or restrict access to materials that, in our opinion, may infringe or infringe on the intellectual property of others. We can also remove or restrict access to the Platform to those who repeat these violations.
terms_of_use.intellectual_property_clause_2: If you believe that your intellectual property rights have been violated, please contact us by email
terms_of_use.changes_to_terms_title: Changes to the Terms of Use and the Platform
terms_of_use.changes_to_terms_description_1: We can change the text of this Agreement. When we do this, we will post a new version on this page and send notifications to your email. By continuing to use the Platform after any changes to the Agreement, you agree to the changes in the Agreement. If you do not want to accept the changes in the Agreement, you can delete your account.
terms_of_use.changes_to_terms_description_2: We are constantly improving the Platform. This means that we can add new or disable old Platform functionality at our sole discretion and without notifying users. By using the Platform, you accept it.

cart.delete_product: Do you really want to delete the product from the shopping cart?
cart.contact_seller_1: Please contact the seller to purchase via email -
cart.contact_seller_2: Please contact the seller to purchase.

form.name: Name
form.content: Provide important information about the product (file format, size, number of pages, release date, number of license users, etc.).
form.upload_files_description: This image appears in the Neobazaar Library, Discover and Profile pages. Your image should be square, at least 600x600px, and JPEG, PNG, PDF, MP3, MP4, WAV, AV format. File size no more than 50 MB.
form.photo_alert_1: Unsupported format. Please upload JPEG, PNG, or GIF images.
form.upload_photo_description: Supports file formats: JPEG, PNG, GIF. The image size is at least 600x600px. Photo size no more than 10 MB. The maximum number of photos is 3 pieces.
form.any_price: Allow customers to pay what they want
form.time: Time of receipt of the goods by the customer
